dialogues.text: Makes you feel any better, I wasn't gonna vote for you anyway. CLARA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Holbrooke drops Phil and Clara off in front of their house, his BLACKBERRY buzzes and he checks it. Г‚ВЂВў CLARA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything OK? HOLBROOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. They just need me downtown in half an hour for a news conference with the Deputy Mayor. Want it for the morning shows. PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't think they're going to be calling you the IT guy any-more. HOLBROOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen guys, I feel weird about not even acknowledging you two. CLARA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't. HOLBROOKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you should be up there with me. You handed this whole case to me. PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiles, winks) Yeah, well-, that's how we roll. They get out of the car and start up the driveway. 0
Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Clara opens the front door, Phil slowly bends down, picking up the morning paper.

dialogues.speaker: CHAZ, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey hey! Up bright and early, aren Phil looks over to see his overly cheery neighbor Chaz in his jogging suit. He smiles, appreciating Chaz for the first time. PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep. We sure are. As he joins Clara on the doorstep, they take each other in. CLARA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have your presentation in a few hours. PHIL (SHRUGS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. You know, I think I'm gonna be OK. CLARA Г‚ВЂВў

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had a good time tonight. PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Me too. It was fun. CLARA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was. PHIL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... let's do this again sometime? CLARA (SMILE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: like that. For the first time the whole night, THEY KISS. Interlocking fingers, they head inside, closing their front door behind them. FACE OUT. THE END
